translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんだと？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What did you say?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「で、シルキィちゃんはどこにいる？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "So, where is Silky-chan?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今日はまだ戦場に出てきておりませんな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "She hasn't appeared on the battlefield yet today."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「シルキィは毎日のように
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Didn't Silky say she comes almost every day?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 来てると言ってなかったか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Didn't she say that she comes here?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ええ、今までこんなことは一日とてなかったこと」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes, this kind of thing hasn't happened for even a single day until now."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なにか狙いでもあるのか……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Does she have some kind of aim...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔剣カオスを持つランス殿を警戒してか……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Maybe she's wary of Lord Rance wielding the Demon Sword Chaos...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふん、答えの出んこと考えても無駄だな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmph, it's useless to think about answers we won't get."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それより、少しお前らの戦い手伝ってやる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "More importantly, I'll help you all fight for a bit."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……珍しいことを言うな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...That's unusual for you to say."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「俺様が華麗に活躍したら
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If I make a brilliant showing,"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: きっとシルキィちゃんも現れるだろう？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Surely Silky-chan will appear, right?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あのときの美形の方！　わーい！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That handsome guy from back then! Yay!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: って感じで」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Something like that."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ない」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Nope."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ありえん」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Impossible."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「やかましいやかましい！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Noisy, noisy!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とにかく行くぞ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Anyway, let's go!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんだと？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What did you say?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もう一度言ってみろ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Say it again?"
"W-well..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 常であれば笑みを声色に貼り付けたヨシフが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yoshifu, who usually has a smile pasted onto his tone,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 部下からの報告に渋く唸っていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: grunted sourly at the report from his subordinate.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「申し訳ありません、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I am sorry,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 昨晩の性行為が激しすぎた為……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it seems last night's sexual activity was too intense...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今のところシルキィが動けないでいるようで……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so for now Silky is unable to move..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「な、なにせここ数日、立て続けで
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I- I mean, in the past few days, consecutively,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 兵の扱いも日に日に乱暴になり……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the way she handles the soldiers has become rougher day by day...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……何人でやったのだ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...How many people did she do it with?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それが……百人ほどで、とのことです」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well... it seems to be about a hundred people."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あまりのことに呆れ、ヨシフは言葉を失う。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Shocked by this, Yoshifu was at a loss for words.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……ああ、もういい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Ah, that's enough."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 別の兵に顔を向ける。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He turned his face to another soldier.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おい、この男と昨晩シルキィが相手をした百人。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hey, those hundred people Silky dealt with last night, including this man,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すぐに処刑をしろ。我が軍に仇なす裏切り者だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: execute them immediately. They are traitors who betray our army."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そ、そんな、私は……ッ！
あ、まま、待て私に触るんじゃ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: W-wait, don't touch me!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あぁぁあぁああああ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Aaaaahhhh!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……魔人シルキィは如何いたしましょう？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...What shall we do with the demon Silky?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「水でもぶっかけて戦わせろ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Douse her with water and make her fight.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まったく、どいつもこいつも……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Honestly, every single one of them...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 儂の周りには敵が多すぎる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There are too many enemies around me."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「心中、お察しします……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I understand how you feel..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一度大きく深呼吸をし、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Taking a deep breath once,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ヨシフはようやく多少の落ち着きを取り戻す。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yoshifu finally regained some composure.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まあ、いつもシルキィに戦わせて
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, we've always let Silky fight,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 儂らの活躍はなかったからな……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so we haven't had any chance to show our own skills...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: たまには良かろう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's about time we stepped in."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「これより魔軍が魔軍のみの力で、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "From now on, the demon army will, by the power of demons alone,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人間共を駆逐する」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: exterminate the humans."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「我々は奴らの五倍の兵力がある。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "We have five times their number of soldiers.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一気にたたみかけさせろ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Let's overwhelm them all at once."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はっ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふう、ざっとこんなもんか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Phew, that's about it."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「アーニキー！　アーニキー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Aniki! Aniki!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おら達ちらっと見てみただすが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "We took a quick look,

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「で、シルキィちゃんはどこにいる？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "So, where is Silky-chan?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今日はまだ戦場に出てきておりませんな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "She hasn't appeared on the battlefield yet today."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「シルキィは毎日のように
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Didn't Silky say she comes almost every day?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 来てると言ってなかったか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Didn't she say that she comes here?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ええ、今までこんなことは一日とてなかったこと」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes, this kind of thing hasn't happened for even a single day until now."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なにか狙いでもあるのか……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Does she have some kind of aim...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔剣カオスを持つランス殿を警戒してか……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Maybe she's wary of Lord Rance wielding the Demon Sword Chaos...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふん、答えの出んこと考えても無駄だな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmph, it's useless to think about answers we won't get."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それより、少しお前らの戦い手伝ってやる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "More importantly, I'll help you all fight for a bit."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……珍しいことを言うな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...That's unusual for you to say."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「俺様が華麗に活躍したら
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If I make a brilliant showing,"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: きっとシルキィちゃんも現れるだろう？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Surely Silky-chan will appear, right?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あのときの美形の方！　わーい！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That handsome guy from back then! Yay!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: って感じで」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Something like that."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ない」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Nope."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ありえん」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Impossible."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「やかましいやかましい！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Noisy, noisy!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とにかく行くぞ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Anyway, let's go!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんだと？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What did you say?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もう一度言ってみろ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Say it again?"
"W-well..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 常であれば笑みを声色に貼り付けたヨシフが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yoshifu, who usually has a smile pasted onto his tone,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 部下からの報告に渋く唸っていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: grunted sourly at the report from his subordinate.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「申し訳ありません、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I am sorry,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 昨晩の性行為が激しすぎた為……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it seems last night's sexual activity was too intense...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今のところシルキィが動けないでいるようで……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so for now Silky is unable to move..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「な、なにせここ数日、立て続けで
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I- I mean, in the past few days, consecutively,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 兵の扱いも日に日に乱暴になり……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the way she handles the soldiers has become rougher day by day...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……何人でやったのだ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...How many people did she do it with?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それが……百人ほどで、とのことです」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well... it seems to be about a hundred people."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あまりのことに呆れ、ヨシフは言葉を失う。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Shocked by this, Yoshifu was at a loss for words.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……ああ、もういい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Ah, that's enough."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 別の兵に顔を向ける。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He turned his face to another soldier.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おい、この男と昨晩シルキィが相手をした百人。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hey, those hundred people Silky dealt with last night, including this man,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すぐに処刑をしろ。我が軍に仇なす裏切り者だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: execute them immediately. They are traitors who betray our army."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そ、そんな、私は……ッ！
あ、まま、待て私に触るんじゃ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: W-wait, don't touch me!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あぁぁあぁああああ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Aaaaahhhh!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……魔人シルキィは如何いたしましょう？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...What shall we do with the demon Silky?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「水でもぶっかけて戦わせろ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Douse her with water and make her fight.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まったく、どいつもこいつも……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Honestly, every single one of them...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 儂の周りには敵が多すぎる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There are too many enemies around me."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「心中、お察しします……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I understand how you feel..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一度大きく深呼吸をし、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Taking a deep breath once,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ヨシフはようやく多少の落ち着きを取り戻す。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yoshifu finally regained some composure.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まあ、いつもシルキィに戦わせて
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, we've always let Silky fight,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 儂らの活躍はなかったからな……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so we haven't had any chance to show our own skills...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: たまには良かろう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's about time we stepped in."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「これより魔軍が魔軍のみの力で、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "From now on, the demon army will, by the power of demons alone,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人間共を駆逐する」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: exterminate the humans."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「我々は奴らの五倍の兵力がある。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "We have five times their number of soldiers.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一気にたたみかけさせろ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Let's overwhelm them all at once."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はっ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふう、ざっとこんなもんか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Phew, that's about it."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「アーニキー！　アーニキー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Aniki! Aniki!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おら達ちらっと見てみただすが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "We took a quick look,
